name: 2DoToo
description:
2DoToo is a space combat game, where you are an astronaut in the space-base trying to obtain access keys to whatever this story is...

Game mechanics:

Controls:

This is the ship you start in, what a beauty. You arrive in this and leave in this once you collected the access key from the level:

You need to obtain the blue access key, it allows you to move onto the next zone either by dying or getting back to the ship:

The bellow bars represent the (3 block - throwable daggers) and the (5 block - health bar):

The "flow-granades" are your enemies, which have a range around them. If your body is within the range, they will attack you with force:

The daggers serve only one purpose and that is pushing the granades out of the way:

The daggers also get stuck into the hit object, to give it more of a interesting look of how weak the outer-ship space walls are:

Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/@Sazails/games
Itch.io: https://sazails.itch.io/
